nodes.text: The Gungan Temples were sizable structures that held special meaning to the Gungans. They were used to hold sacred staffs in the city of Otoh Jahai three millennia prior to the Battle of Yavin. Boss Rugor Nass later built one to serve as as a rallying point for the Gungan Grand Army after the liberation of Harte Secur during the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY. Gungan Temples required 3000 units each of ore, nova crystals, and carbon to construct, and were built by Glurrgs.

Gungan Temples appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack. In multiplayer, players can build monuments such as this one, and if defended for 200 in-game "days," can win the scenario. During the Trade Federation campaign's bonus mission, an alternate version of the Battle of Grassy Plains, the objective is to destroy a Temple defended by the Gungan Grand Army.
